episodes.synopsis: When a group of children on a school visit to some caves return to the surface, every single person over the age of 15 has disappeared.
episodes.title: The Disappearance

episodes.synopsis: Callum has formed a biker gang and has designs on the City Hotel as the gang's new hangout. He befriends Kat as she might be useful to his success.
episodes.title: The Invasion

episodes.synopsis: Having won her place in Sadiq's gang, Kat leads a team to the university to find food. Holly is taken hostage.
episodes.title: The Message

episodes.synopsis: Doomsday Dora's message warns the children they must reunite the two parallel worlds quickly or adults and children will remain separated permanently.
episodes.title: The Quest

episodes.synopsis: The Questers stop at a Funfair, where Reese has a vision of Doomsday Dora, who is trying to send a message to the kids. But where has she hidden it?
episodes.title: The Funfair

episodes.synopsis: A code given to Reese leads the Questers to a simulator where scientists were trained how to run the Sparticle Project.
episodes.title: The Big Freeze

episodes.synopsis: While on their way to the Sparticle Project, Ami is captured in the woods by the Water Rats.
episodes.title: The Water Rats

episodes.synopsis: The Questers are intrigued by Head Boy Jeremy and his posh boarding school.
episodes.title: The Unsuitables

episodes.synopsis: Jeffrey is proud of his abundant garden, but when hungry waifs turn up at the hotel, he finds himself at war and loses it.
episodes.title: The Harvest

episodes.synopsis: Holly is anxious when she realizes the journey to the Sparticle Project is coming to its conclusion.
episodes.title: The Fall Out

episodes.synopsis: Without the adults and the automatic cooling systems, the world's nuclear power plants are melting down and threatening to destroy the earth.
episodes.title: The Hot Zone

episodes.synopsis: Ami lapses into a diabetic coma and the Questers rush him to the hospital to find some insulin. Meanwhile, Tia is turning 15 tomorrow.
episodes.title: The Emergency

episodes.synopsis: The Questers and Ranchers are reunited at Black Tor Mine, where the adults were separated from the children by the machine of the Sparticle Project.
episodes.title: The Sparticle Project

video.title: The Sparticle Mystery
video.synopsis: Adults have disappeared off the face of the Earth! At first kids celebrate, but one group knows civilization will begin to break down without them.
